title: Mantra
choose-your-mantra-description: Choose from our suggested mantras below or create your own to guide your journey. Repeat it anytime during your session to reset and reconnect.
i-drink-with-clarity-and-intention: I drink with clarity and intention.
did-you-know-description: Research shows that mantras reduce stress and help you make conscious choices during drinking situations instead of reacting on autopilot.
error-creating-mantra: Mantra has to be at least 1 character long
